website_summaries.verdict: The ultimate in portability; lightweight yet strong and sturdy. Deluxe adjustability with comfortable and removable velcro pads for easy clean down.
pros: An ergonomic and comfortable portable massage chair
Can easily fit clients ranging from 4-feet-6-inches tall to 6-feet-6-inches tall, and up to 600 pounds
Folds down conveniently and fits into nylon carry case with padded strap
cons: Some users find that there are too many elements to adjust

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice and functional chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice and functional chair. It is easy to set up and easy to fold. It is incredibly flexible and can be adjusted in a reamrkable range of angles that will accommodate more body types than any other chair on the market. I have been using the Pisces Dolphin II for a long time - a terrific chair in its own right - but I find that the Ergo Pro II is much easier to use, easier to adjust and to fit the client in. There is also a major difference in price between these 2 chairs - so with the Ergo II there is more bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy chair
customer_reviews.text: I like that this chair does not tip over while client is getting off or onto it like my previous chair did. I have only used it for 4 gigs but the design appears to be very "strong." Not sure it is so "lite" though but not much heavier then my previous one. I prefer that it is built strong and lasting rather then light. My one complaint that may not seem to be a big issue for some but has been for me. The arm rest is right at crotch level so I need to be extra cautious or avoid working in front of the client. I wish this was adjustable but other then that I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: MoJo3

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky, screws loose, but comfy
customer_reviews.text: I've had this chair 9 months now. Use it very frequently for my business. I have gotten rave reviews in regards to its comfort. I also love how sturdy it is & that it has q larger working weight. However, today I have discovered that I have no screws in the Chest support. Not sure if they were loose & fell out or were not there to begin with. It is also super squeaky, even with my smallest clients, it squeaks. I am very disappointed in this as I had done a lot of research before purchasing it. My previous chair Earthlite didnt have any of those problems & I had it for 8 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: amazing equipment
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional chair works great for patient who cannot lay down I've tried many other chairs but I haven't found as good as this highly recommended I'm a therapists 8 plus years.
customer_reviews.author: Andriy  Chetin

customer_reviews.title: The best one out there
customer_reviews.text: In love with this chair! I love that it can hold up to 600 lbs and that it has wheels!
customer_reviews.author: Philly & Buddha

customer_reviews.title: Best weight rating I could find
customer_reviews.text: Stout and strong. Best weight rating I could find. You get some hefty people sometimes. I'm confident it will hold and they are always comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so Happy I made this investment
customer_reviews.text: The chair was extremely easy to set up and easy to carry and pull if need be all of my clients so far found it to be comfortable the fact that it adjusts as well is plus and most of the parts you can move to fit tall or short people it and its awesome chair and I am glad I have it
customer_reviews.author: ontavia  E

customer_reviews.title: High working weight, durable, and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: After doing some extensive research and having used other massage chair models, this was the best fit for me. It is a strong and durable chair capable of handling a high working weight. In addition, it has some great features with regard to adjustments. The seat is large and comfortable and the knee rests are removable. I am more than satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt E. Saberg

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better for the price
customer_reviews.text: Over all this chair is great. The bottom adjustments by the wheels let you tilt your client which is nice. My only complaints are the velcro is noisy under the seat cushion and the chest piece isnt the sturdiest. I'd like a little more durability for a chair this price and a max working load of 600lbs. It also feels better on carpet or a rug. The bag is a tight fit but not a big deal to me since I'm not traveling often with this chair.
customer_reviews.author: whitney

customer_reviews.title: best one to buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the best chair for many reasons but he 600lb support and extra thick and comfortable padding are the most wonderful. Also, make sure you replace every setting to original or you will have trouble zipping up the care case. I made my money back in just a few weeks of massaging so go for it folks, this is the chair for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: Five stars all the way. Fast efficient service, great product. I love the removable knee rests, an absolute must have for people with knee issues. It is worth "the price of admission" for this feature alone. I keep the knee rests off for those arthritic folks to make getting in and out as effortless as it gets. I can always add them quickly. This chair quickly unfolds and is ready to go. The choice of colors is the cherry on the sundae!
customer_reviews.author: Her Majesty

customer_reviews.title: Well made, excellent for what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this for my someone suffering from Neck cancer. We needed a chair that was adjustable and that would support his head in a down position, as apposed to a recliner that rests the head back. We also had to make sure it was well made and safe. He takes naps in this chair as he recovers. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LAnderson

customer_reviews.title: Defective telescopic leg!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this chair at the end of October 2018. Have previously used it exactly 3 times with family members each of whose weight does not exceed 230 lbs. I have made no adjustments to the chair after setting it up which was really easy. Today I tried to adjust the telescopic leg only to find that the leg would not adjust even with help from 2 male family members. They were able to move the leg but I could not. I fortunately have not gone out to any profession events with this chair.
customer_reviews.author: David J Londono

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality and so comfortable. I had an older one that lasted for 20 years. It was time to get a new one. I really do love this chair! It's great for chair massage events and sturdy as well as light enough to tote along! I love the wheels and cover!! Makes it so clean and professional! Bueno!
customer_reviews.author: Breanah Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Knee pads don’t adjust for height
customer_reviews.text: If you’re 5’3” like me than it’s fine. But if you’re 6’ or over like my 6’ 3” husband than you might want to consider something else. The problem we ran into was even with it raised at it’s maximum height his knees were folded up in a very uncomfortably position and the knee pads only adjust forward or back (not down) about two inches. The chair was for him, so we couldn’t keep it considering that trying to use it was very uncomfortable. It might be rated for a working load of 600lb but if you’re knees are crammed again the back of your thighs, than your not going to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrsmac

customer_reviews.title: Affordable & Comfy massage chair
customer_reviews.text: Great massage chair. Would love to see in future ability to slightly incline forward! Then only complaint is that when you change the height, it makes a squeaky noise the entire time ur massaging...which is definitely not cool when your doing events n massaging back to back!
customer_reviews.author: Chuly Snakis❤️🍷

customer_reviews.title: u get what you pay for!!!!
customer_reviews.text: we order three or four of these. They are good quality. worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnetc

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Makes other chairs look wimpy.
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. Not the lightest chair I have ever used but I don't mind at all. So sturdy and people always comment on how comfortable it is. I never worry about anyone's weight because of the high working weight limit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: As an LMT that has tried many different chairs, this one is the BEST! Not a huge fan of chair massage because I personally don’t think most chairs are comfortable. This one is beyond comfortable. Great quality chair.
customer_reviews.author: tina herrera

customer_reviews.title: Best chair I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Excellent positioning options. Some clients can't kneel and the knee pads are removable. Nice comfy foam in the cushions. I like that the face cradle flexes/extends but also telescopes. I like how solid it feels and that I can easily pull the chair on sturdy wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Ria Bo Bia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it, my clients love it. Also it arrived very quickly
customer_reviews.author: Rosi Officer

customer_reviews.title: Good chair. Instructions for opening it are hidden in ...
customer_reviews.text: Good chair. Instructions for opening it are hidden in a booklet that is locked up inside the chair. Look for the little bungie cord lock to undo before you try opening the chair.
customer_reviews.author: David Burch

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: I love this one worth every penny I have used it a dozen times and I just love it easy set up and perfect for what I need o my only complaint is the handle on the bag when Pulling around a lot it can start to rub your hand a bit weird but I just made a cover for it and it’s fine. This one is definitely the best quality chair I have seen and I am just thankful that I found something so awesome
customer_reviews.author: Jason Zwayer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Today I used this chair for an event. Worked well people thought it was comfy. Easy to roll in, to pack up and leave.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: A very durable massage chair
customer_reviews.text: The best and most comfortable massage chair I have sat on. This will hold very large people.
customer_reviews.author: Seller of the used item

customer_reviews.title: Dynamic workhorse
customer_reviews.text: I Love this massage chair almost as much as my clients do! Very sturdy and Portable friendly with its light weight and very easy to care for. Great chair for the money! It easily adjusts to every clients preference. Would definitely recommend this chair to any therapists that are looking for a comfortable, reliable chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: designed for a diverse clientele
customer_reviews.text: I especially like the removable knee rests. Many people have knee problems that make a traditional massage chair inaccessible. I also like the 600lb working weight, so I do not have to worry about large clients.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair...works great and legs adjust a lot better than previous model.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Fenter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best chair out there for the money. Comfortable because it can be easily adjusted for each client. M
customer_reviews.author: Maria Muriello

customer_reviews.title: Damage item
customer_reviews.text: The replacement chair is also broken. I want a new product sent to me ASAP. And return this $400 damage chair massage for the second time. Please do pay attention to it. This is being damaging my work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So extremely comfortable and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This is beyond the most comfortable massage chair I've ever used! My clients love it and I got a massage in it while pregnant and it was so comfortable and stable! So easy to set up, adjust and take down and put into the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna B.

customer_reviews.title: Great chair and company to deal with.
customer_reviews.text: I bought chair as a gift for my wife. She is a message therapist and this chair was highly recommended. She has used this brand from other therapist and is the best as far as adjustability and comfort. On a side note, I bought a carrying case but the company emailed me before shipping to verify if I wanted 2 carrying cases. Obviously I didn’t and they adjusted the order and gave me a refund. Excellent work Massageproducts.
customer_reviews.author: OneT

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best massage chair ever! Worth the price! Easy to set up and adjust for each individual. When I do chair massage gigs all the other therapists are a little envious.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Van Denabeele

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: The chair works great for events, it’s light weight and portable easy to set up and break down.
customer_reviews.author: Jose O.

customer_reviews.title: Very great investment
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome I've had it for about a year, it's extremely comfortable to be in and comfortable for practitioner user. Many easily adjustable features make it great at events when switching from a 6' man to a 5' woman. And the adjustable leg height saves my back and definitely lended to improved body mechanics while doing chair events.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Very Professional Massage chair
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, adjusts smoothly for comfort I work in a brokers office havent had one complaint they love how adjustable it is. I Love the wheels makes it so much easier to travel with and it looks very professional as well. It also was very easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: melissa manz

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: Great chair. Easy to transport, set up and take down. Clients rave about the comfort. Only thing I ordered a purple one, but received black. Divine order.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. New therapist and I will never need another chair. It is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Melany1206

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chair and quite comparable to my other stronglite chair. Was thinking it would also have metal knee pads like my previous one, but quality is still mist excellent. Bag is heavy duty and durable as well.
customer_reviews.author: CShorty

customer_reviews.title: Seems great except not made correctly.
customer_reviews.text: Just received it , seems great except the one I got seems to be poorly put together. There is an issue with the front legs not being level which makes it impossible to use the locking mechanism. Without the chair being properly secured and imbalanced I don't feel safe using this with clients. Will be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Great chair. I have a 6'7" client and the chair was able to adjust to his height and felt very stable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING chair. Easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING chair. Easy to adjust. A breeze to transport and pack away. This chair is so comfortable. Amazing quality.
customer_reviews.author: MT&SAHM

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair !
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Very light and easy to move and store.
customer_reviews.author: Diane C

customer_reviews.title: I bought this because I was using this same chair ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was using this same chair at a chiropractic office where I worked. That Ergo Pro was purchased less than a year ago. However, this chair does not seem to be as well made from the pads to the moving joints. Also, it did not come with a pregnancy pad. On the plus side it did include a carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Howard

customer_reviews.title: Love chair
customer_reviews.text: Was an error in the order but was fixed in less than a day. I now have my dream chair & its fully adjustable❣
customer_reviews.author: Andrea murtha

customer_reviews.title: False info on weight of chair
customer_reviews.text: This product weighs 23 lbs, NOT 19 lbs. as advertised. Without the wheels it would be too heavy to carry without back strain.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Strong, durable, but light. Easy to set up and take down. Had it for 1 year with no problems, well worth it! I've also worked with other chairs and this one seems the most comfortable to me as well.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Like it So Far
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy this table so far. Seems strong, light, and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny S.

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for a massage chair for a while. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Shanice

customer_reviews.title: Doing good so far.....
customer_reviews.text: It's been 2 months since I bought it. It's very comfortable and clients love the removable knee pads.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far all my clients love it. It is light weight and sets up ...
customer_reviews.text: So far all my clients love it. It is light weight and sets up easily. It will accommodate my small and large clients. If I had one complaint it would be that the arm rest will not move up or down, it will only tilt. Great chair!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well fro our chair massage program. Removable knee pads are a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus I.

customer_reviews.title: The massage chair is great, other than the face part which I found ...
customer_reviews.text: The massage chair is great, other than the face part which I found a bit too soft such that I felt that supporting board with my face. Having that piece made of memory foam or other dense foam would be better perhaps. I did like the ease of set-up and take down, and the fact that it is adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It even came in purple!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy setup and adjustments. I choose this chair, in part, because of the higher than usual working weight. I like not having to worry or ask how much a client weighes. I really love that this chair has wheels that stick outside the carry case makes it so much easier to cart around.
customer_reviews.author: T. Crotts

customer_reviews.title: I am Happy I found this chair after an extensive internet search.
customer_reviews.text: Given its weight capacity, its portability and ease of packing, plus the range and ease of making adjustments, I've failed to find any other chair even close to having all the benefits this chair has for the money I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Sare

customer_reviews.title: The best chair massage
customer_reviews.text: The best chair massage, in my opinion. Very high quality, easy to set up at a festival or whatnot.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Set up & breakdown in minutes
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Set up & breakdown in minutes. Light weight. Comforitable. Has a nice case for transport & is easy to pack up but we leave it out because we use it frequently. Bought for home personal use. Have had ours 6 years. Used weekly by our professional masseuse in lieu of a table during cold season or pollen season (bought flannel head rest covers). Elderly parents can sit on it w/ease. They benefit the most from our purchase. They couldn't climb on top of a massage table. Ordered another one here for their home.
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great product. Strong and comfortable. Everything I would want from a massage chair. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: r sami

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great chair!! Absolutely wonderful customer service (Andrew!!)...So glad I invested in this chair :)
customer_reviews.author: RockinHotBody

customer_reviews.title: Happy Therapist
customer_reviews.text: The chair arrived earlier than I anticipated which made for an impeccable Friday. The chair itself I am very satisfied with. The carrying bag could have a little more durability as the zipper connectors all fell off within a few times handling. All in all I would rather have a defective zipper vs defective device. Would completely recommend. :)
customer_reviews.author: montegobay

customer_reviews.title: This chair is comfy, sleek, and stable. ...
customer_reviews.text: This chair is comfy, sleek, and stable. It holds up well to plenty of mobile chair massage and is adjustable for a wide array of body types. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: James E Sprigler

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love these massage chair, this is my second chair. Very easy to set up and break down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chair! Shipped to me before I expected it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent chair! Shipped to me before I expected it! Light, easy to use, very durable. And purple! Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great chair and easy to fold, use and carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: My clients are very comfortable when on it
customer_reviews.text: Very durable chair. My clients are very comfortable when on it. Thank you for such a great product. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Stronglite Ergo Pro II is awesome. I love how easy it is to readjust for each client.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and strong
customer_reviews.text: Gift to my Granddaughter. She is a new graduate and it is great for her.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Stall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's great!! Super light to carry on!! And strong to work !
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This chair is easy to set up, break down and very sturdy. Really love it
customer_reviews.author: Kathy King

customer_reviews.title: My clients do love the chair
customer_reviews.text: Received the massage chair in a timely manner. My clients do love the chair, they say it is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Barber

customer_reviews.title: Stronglite ErgoPro Massage Chair and Curved Headrest
customer_reviews.text: I love this massage chair. I use this chair at the nursing home and other events. It is so easy to set up and start massages.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa M. Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Massage chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair is much better than my previous less expensive chair. Much more durable. Still have some concern with the longevity of the plastic parts of the headpiece but I guess time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Scott F Jutte

customer_reviews.title: Comes with so many adjustment possibilies that anyone can be made comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. Comes with so many adjustment possibilies that anyone can be made comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: College Student

customer_reviews.title: and her clients love it as well
customer_reviews.text: Present for my wife, who is a certified massage therapist. She tells me this is a CADILLAC of chairs, and her clients love it as well. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey B. Cline

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love my Stronglite massage chair. It is super comfortable and light weight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease to set up and adjust love the sturdiness and that I can really push on the clients without feeling like I’m going to push them over
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the chair. Very lightweight and easy to carry/wheel around.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Russell

customer_reviews.title: All around great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Really good chair, and at a good price. Love the many adjustment options and light weight! The only suggestion for improvement would be to have stronger removable knee supports. They are strong, but it is not always possible to tell people to sit first and THEN put legs in place. No issues yet, but you know people do whatever they want. The fact that you can remove them outweighs the potential issue though, especially for those with knee problems. Love the high working weight rating. ALL of my clients have given positive feedback on this chair and most prefer it to my Earthlite Avila II (also an excellent chair).
customer_reviews.author: MPG

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Very good quality and easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Very good quality and easy to adjust. I wished that it could be a bit less expensive tho
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best chair
customer_reviews.text: The padding on this chair is the best I've seen, even in more expensive chairs. The weight limit on this chair is high too so anyone can use it without fear of it breaking. Very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Pigeon

customer_reviews.title: Stronglite Heavy Duty Massage Chair
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase. I needed a heavy duty chair that was easy to adapt to a variety of client weights and physical limitations. This chair came highly recommended by a former instructor and I will now add my recommendations to his. Removable leg supports. Seat, chest pad, head rest and arm support can be customized to client. Wheels allow it to be moved easily without having to carry it. Clients have given it rave reviews for comfortability. Yes, it is expensive, but I think of it as an investment, not just an expense.
customer_reviews.author: Dharma

product_meta.title: STRONGLITE Portable Massage Chair Ergo Pro II - Ultra-Strong, Lightweight, Folding Tattoo Spa Massage Chair with Wheels & Carry Case (600lbs Working Weight)
product_meta.description: The Ergo Pro II chair is the only chair on the market co-designed along with David Palmer, the Father of Contemporary Chair Massage and Founder of Touchpro. David says," after training over 11,000 practitioners we know massage chairs and the Ergo-Pro II is our exclusive choice!" Newly redesigned, the Ergo Pro II is more comfortable than ever! Package Includes: - Ergo Pro Chair - Deluxe Adjustable Platform with FacePillow - Chair Carry Case Key Features - Rounded Pads for Comfort - Durable semi-gloss silver aluminum frame holds 1200 pounds static weight; 600 pounds working weight - Lightweight (only 19 lbs.) - Telescoping legs adjust to therapist's height alignment and comfort - One-step adjustments on platform, arm support and chest pad allow quick versatile positioning - Optimum-sized chest pad provides comfort for petite and large clients - Comfortably seats clients 4'6" to 6'6" - Offset nylon wheels make toting easy - Clever hidden pouch holds client's glasses and jewelry - Adjustable seat permits reversing the client for leg, foot, or anterior torso work. - Available in your choice of Royal Blue, Burgundy, Teal or Black soft, leather-like NatureTouch upholstery. Please inquire if color not shown. - Limited Lifetime Warranty
feature_bullets: LIGHTWEIGHT YET STRONG: Very Portable. Made with light and very strong heat treated T6 aluminum alloy in a durable, high gloss powder-coated finish. The patented double tube design adds extra stability. 600lbs Working Weight

HIGHLY ADJUSTABLE: Comfortably seats clients from 4' 6" to 6' 6". Most versatile chair on the market for easy client positioning. Adjustments include a chest pad that slides and tilts, a fully adjustable face cradle & a seat that rises, lowers and tilts.

ERGONOMIC DESIGN: The height adjustable seat and moveable armrests ensures that therapists can find the perfect height for ergonomic work & the adjustable armrest, and removable leg pads are perfect for disabled or injured clients.
COMPLETE PACKAGE: Includes attached wheels for ease of movement, valuables pouch, and a rugged ballistic nylon carry case with a heavy-duty zipper. Weighs 24lbs

EASY TO MOVE AND STORE: Folds compactly. Attached wheels make it easy to move, or use the ballistic nylon carry case with padded strap for massage on the go. LIFETIME LIMITED WARRANTY by STRONGLITE, the massage chair leader since 1986.
